Source.Name: jack-audio-connection-kit
Source.Summary: JACK2 low-latency audio server for multi-core machines.
Source.Description: JACK2 is a C++ version of the JACK low-latency audio server for multi-core machines. It is a new implementation of the JACK server core features that aims at removing some limitations of the JACK1 design. The activation system has been changed for a data flow model and lock-free programming techniques for graph access have been used to have a more dynamic and robust system.
